string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
I want you to meet with someone. He is no friend of mine but he could use your assistance.
Good luck stalker.
Assassination for Lukash
Lukash has a target he needs eliminated.

Hey, I'm glad you came. I have something I need you to do for me. There is a mutual enemy of ours that needs to be eliminated. He is dangerous. Take him down immediately. I will give you two days, this is more than enough.
Awesome bro! Thanks.
Freedom Assault on Monolith
Lukash has asked you to lead Freedom in an assault against the Monolith. The execution time is 3 day.

Monolith forces keep breaking through our blockade. I want to take the fight to them for once. I've recruited an assault squad and want you to lead them in an invasion on Monolith territory. You have 3 days at your disposal.
Man, you've got a set on you. Great job.
Search Lab X-8
Search Lab X-8 in Outskirts for evidence of Clear Sky occupation.

I have received information that former members of Clear Sky might have occupied Lab X-8 some time ago. I need you to investigate the Lab and see if you can recover any documents they might have left there.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Raise Money To Join Freedom
Lukash wants 15,000 UAH to let you join Freedom.
Ah, good. You will enjoy joining Freedom. Just pay the 15,000 UAH fee and you're in.
Welcome to Freedom, bro.
Repel Assault on Freedom Base
Intercept the assault squad closing in on Freedom camp. Report back to Lukash once you have cleared the area.
Forces hostile to Freedom are moving in on one of our camps. I need someone capable to repel the incursion. Are you the man for the job?
The task is done? Good.
Recapture Territory for Freedom
It is necessary to regain the territory of Freedom. The execution time is 12 hours.

There is one mission. The "Duties", fuck them, don't get away with it: our patrols are shelling, roadblocks are being attacked. The other day, our camp was swamped. It's not nice, you know? We should teach these assholes a lesson before they shoot us in the open. We gotta kick them out of the occupied territory. I give you a day for everything.
Excellent. Well done.
Capture Monolith Member
Lukash has tasked you with finding and capturing a member of Monolith.

There is one job... Dangerous, yes. They don't agree to any of our jobs. Can't you at least respond? "The Monolith continues to break through the Barrier, we've barely contained these endless crowds of fanatics kicking around. But I have an idea how to stop these breakthroughs for a while. We need someone who can sneak into their territory and take out a certain member of the group to give them a little morale. What do you think? Are there any more brave men left in the Zone?
Ah, you survived! I see your hostage did not. Well, a dead Monolith is a dead Monolith. Here is your payment.
Assassinate Duty Member
Lukash has tasked you with finding and eliminating a target.
There is a certain individual who has been very loud in his opposition to Freedom and needs to be quieted. Are you any good at shutting people up?
Great! You do us proud. Here is what I promised:
%s Gun Runner
Lukash has asked you to find a %s. Return to him when you find what he is looking for.
With Duty to the south of us and Monolith to the north, we are cut off. Our weaponry is wearing out and we need replacements. Have you ever done any gun running?
We could really use a new {item_name}. If you can find us one in great condition I would be willing to pay a good price for it.
Well done. This will go a long way in helping us defend the Zone. Here is the payment I promised.
Wild Game %s for Skinflint
Field dress freshly dead mutants to collect game meat. Then deliver %s to Skinflint in the Military Warehouse base camp. The execution time is 3 days.

Yeah, man, I got something for you. Times are hungry now, you know. You can't find normal food, but you gotta feed the fighters something. Sure, sometimes dudes bring a couple of flesh or boars, but lately there's something less and less willing to go for meat. Give me a hand, will you? Before we starve to death in here.
Thank you, ma'am. Bring it, and our Cook will figure something out. Just don't take too long, you've got 3 days.
Great, you are a good hunter! I have payment for you.
Deliver Equipment to Skinflint
Skinflint has a delivery that needs to be picked up. The time of execution is 24 hours.
Everybody's busy, everybody doesn't have time... And I needed a courier right away. I have a package to pick up and deliver. We just need to make it quick, 24 hours at the most. Will you take it?
Thank you, stalker! Yes, here's your payment:
Find %s for Screw
%s are required by Screw to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Yo, man. Are you interested in doing a job for me? I need specific tools to operate on weapons.
Good, I need a {item_name}. I will pay you if you can bring a set back to me.
Thanks, man! I knew there was a reason I asked you. You look like a man who can get shit done.
Find %s for Screw
%s are required by Screw to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Haha, I hate to ask. But I could really use more tools. You brought me what I have asked last time but I need a higher quality set. Can you help out again?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
You keep this shit up, everyone around here is going to love you. Thanks, man.
Find %s for Screw
%s are required by Screw to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Haha, I hate to ask. But I could really use more tools. You brought me what I have asked last time but I need a higher quality set. Can you help out again?
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
You keep this shit up, everyone around here is going to love you. Thanks, man.
